name: Saddle Blanket Mirror
description: This classic mirror is 12X12 and comes in your choice of patina and orientation (based off of centers copper line) . Hung from silver chain.

name: 121212 Terrarium
description:
The perfect planter! The top is made from 12 six inch triangle bevels hand soldered, creating a unique view from every angle. When placed in direct sun it shoots rainbows and refractions around the room. The bases have a two inch depth, silicone sealed and felt tips to protect the piece and your surfaces. 

Each planter comes with instructions on how to plant and care for your plants in the terrarium. Available in your choice of patina.

Made to order. Will ship in 1-2 weeks. Plants not included.

name: 666 Prism Terrarium
description:
Prism Terrarium made from 3 6x6x6 triangle bevels, and the base from clear glass. Diameter of base at widest point is 7 inches. All bases are sealed in silicone and have felt pads to prevent scratches to any surface.

All orders come with a baggie of lava rock to assist in draining and your choice of top cover. Please specify when ordering: white rocks, river gravel or sand. Instructions on how to care properly for plants while using this piece come included as well, to make sure you and your plant have a long and healthy life together.

This item contains lead.

**Plants are not shipped with terrarium.**

name: 9" Beveled Cube Planter
description:
This stunning cube planter is made entirely of bevels. Five 9" bevels make the cube with a base of 6" bevel triangle. Total height of 1 foot. 

**this item contains lead**
**this item comes UNPLANTED**
**please be aware there is a 2 week lead time on all orders**

name: Large Bevel Starburst
description: 10 2x6 diamond shape bevels make this lovely starburst. Rustic hand-twisted hook for hanging. Black patina. 12 inch diameter

name: Taurus Constellation
description:
Taurus constellation lies in the northern sky. Its name means “bull” in Latin. The constellation is symbolized by the bull’s head, ♉. It is one of the 12 constellations of the zodiac, first catalogued by the Greek astronomer Ptolemy in the 2nd century. The constellation’s history, however, dates back to the Bronze Age.

--------------------------

Glass nuggets on 14G wire. Available in your choice of patina. Nuggets will vary but will always be a deep green: color of Taurus. 8.5" long, 11" at it's widest. Hung from fishing line, chain was too distracting and looked like part of the constellation. Looks great in a window or on the wall. 

**Please note this prototype was done on 20G wire, the actual piece will be thicker wire!**

name: Cancer Constellation
description:
Cancer constellation is located in the northern sky.

Its name means “the crab” in Latin. Cancer is the faintest of the 12 zodiac constellations.

Its symbol is ♋. 

-----------------


Glass nuggets on 14G wire. Available in your choice of patina. Nuggets will vary but will always be a clear: color of Cancer. 8" long, 8" at it's widest. Hung from fishing line, chain was too distracting and looked like part of the constellation. Looks great in a window or on the wall.

name: Capricornus Constellation
description:
Capricornus constellation is located in the southern sky. Its name means “the goat” in Latin.

Capricornus is one of the 12 zodiac constellations and it is represented by the symbol ♑.

---------------------

Glass nuggets on 14G wire. Available in your choice of patina. Nuggets will vary but will always be a orange: color of Capricorn. 7.5" long, 9.5" at it's widest. Hung from fishing line, chain was too distracting and looked like part of the constellation. Looks great in a window or on the wall.

name: Libra Constellation
description:
Libra constellation lies in the southern sky. It is one of the twelve zodiac constellations. Its name means “the weighing scales” in Latin, and it is usually depicted as the scales held by the Greek goddess of justice Dike (or Astraea), represented by the neighbouring Virgo constellation.

Libra is the only zodiac constellation that represents an object, not an animal or a character from mythology. The four brightest stars in the constellation form a quadrangle. Alpha and Beta Librae mark the scales’ balance beam, and Gamma and Sigma Librae represent the weighing pans. Libra constellation is also home to HD 140283, popularly known as Methuselah, currently the oldest known star in the universe.

Libra constellation is represented by the symbol ♎. 

-----------------

Glass nuggets on 14G wire. Available in your choice of patina. Nuggets will vary but will always be a pink: color of Libra. 8" long, 5" at it's widest. Hung from fishing line, chain was too distracting and looked like part of the constellation. Looks great in a window or on the wall.

name: Pisces Constellation
description:
Pisces constellation lies in the northern sky. Its name means “the fish” (plural) in Latin. It is one of the zodiac constellations, originally catalogued by the Greek astronomer Ptolemy in the 2nd century. Its symbol is ♓.

-------------------

Glass nuggets on 14G wire. Available in your choice of patina. Nuggets will vary but will always be a aquamarine: color of Pisces. 6" long, 10" at it's widest. Hung from fishing line, chain was too distracting and looked like part of the constellation. Looks great in a window or on the wall. 

**Please note this prototype was done on 20G wire, the actual piece will be thicker wire!**

name: Sagittarius Constellation
description:
Sagittarius constellation lies in the southern sky. It is one of the constellations of the zodiac. The constellation represents the archer in Greek mythology and is usually depicted as a centaur holding a bow and arrow.

Sagittarius’ location is easy to find because the constellation lies on the Milky Way. Its symbol is ♐.

-----------------

Glass nuggets on 14G wire. Available in your choice of patina. Nuggets will vary but will always be a denim blue: color of Sagittarius. 12" long, 8" at it's widest. Hung from fishing line, chain was too distracting and looked like part of the constellation. Looks great in a window or on the wall.

name: Scorpius Constellation
description:
Scorpius constellation lies in the southern sky. It represents the scorpion and is associated with the story of Orion, the hunter in Greek mythology.

Scorpius is one of the zodiac constellations, first catalogued by the Greek astronomer Ptolemy in the 2nd century. Its symbol is ♏. The constellation is located near the centre of the Milky Way.
----------------

Glass nuggets on 14G wire. Available in your choice of patina. Nuggets will vary but will always be a red or black: color of Scorpius. 11" long, 5" at it's widest. Hung from fishing line, chain was too distracting and looked like part of the constellation. Looks great in a window or on the wall.

name: Aquarius Constellation
description:
Aquarius constellation is located in the southern hemisphere. Its name means “the water-bearer” (or “cup-bearer”) in Latin and its symbol is ♒, which represents water.
----------------------

Glass nuggets on 14G wire. Available in your choice of patina. Nuggets will vary but will always be a blue: color of Aquarius. 7" long, 13" at it's widest. Hung from fishing line, chain was too distracting and looked like part of the constellation. Looks great in a window or on the wall. 

**Please note this prototype was done on 20G wire, the actual piece will be thicker wire!**

name: Leo Constellation
description:
Leo constellation lies in the northern sky. It is one of the zodiac constellations and one of the largest constellations in the night sky. It represents the lion and is usually associated with the Nemean lion in Greek mythology. Its symbol is ♌.
-----------------------------

Glass nuggets on 14G wire. Available in your choice of patina. Nuggets will vary but will always be a gold: color of Leo. 7" long, 9" at it's widest. Hung from fishing line, chain was too distracting and looked like part of the constellation. Looks great in a window or on the wall. 

**Please note this prototype was done on 20G wire, the actual piece will be thicker wire!**

name: Virgo Constellation
description:
Virgo constellation lies in the southern sky. Its name means “virgin” in Latin. The constellation is represented by the symbol ♍. Virgo is one of the twelve zodiac constellations, first catalogued by the Greek astronomer Ptolemy in the 2nd century.

It contains Spica, one of the brightest stars in the night sky.

----------------------

Glass nuggets on 14G wire. Available in your choice of patina. Nuggets will vary but will always be a silver; color of Virgo. 10" long, 5" at it's widest. Hung from fishing line, chain was too distracting and looked like part of the constellation. Looks great in a window or on the wall.

name: Aries Constellation
description:
Aries constellation is located in the northern hemisphere.

Its name means “the ram” in Latin. The symbol for the constellation is ♈ and it represents a ram’s horns.

The constellation is usually associated with the story about the Golden Fleece in Greek mythology.
-------------------------

Glass nuggets on 14G wire. Available in your choice of patina. Nuggets will vary but will always be a red; color of Aries. 9" long, 7" at it's widest. Hung from fishing line, chain was too distracting and looked like part of the constellation. Looks great in a window or on the wall.

name: Gemini Constellation
description:
Gemini constellation is located in the northern hemisphere of the sky. Its name means “the twins” in Latin. Gemini is one of the zodiac constellations, first catalogued by the Greek astronomer Ptolemy in the 2nd century.

The constellation represents the twins Castor and Pollux (Polydeuces), also known as the Dioscuri in ancient times, in Greek mythology. The constellation’s symbol is ♊.

Gemini is known mainly for its two bright stars, Castor and Pollux, for the neutron star Geminga, and for several notable deep sky objects, among them the open cluster Messier 35, the Eskimo Nebula, the Jellyfish Nebula, and the Medusa Nebula.
------------------------
Glass nuggets on 14G wire. Available in your choice of patina. Nuggets will vary but will always be yellow or light green; color of gemini. 10" long, 9" at it's widest. Hung from fishing line, chain was too distracting and looked like part of the constellation. Looks great in a window or on the wall.

name: Quilted Terrarium
description:
Spectacular topper is made from a whopping 30 diamond bevels. Creates a kaleidoscope image at anything planted inside. 8" in height with a 2" base. Base is sealed in silicone with felt tips to protect surfaces. All terrariums come with instructions on how to plant and care for your glass. 

Made to Order 1-2 week lead time.
This item contains lead. 
Does not come with plants!

name: Pentagram
description: Pentagram in your choice of colors! 8" big, hang from suction cup or fishing wire. Looks great on a wall or window!

name: Cow Skull
description: Beautifully Simple Cow Skull.  Southwestern inspired. Made from with cream and dark brown glass. Beautiful on the wall or window!

name: Potted Plant
description: For those of that can't keep a plant alive! No water necessary, just hang in a sunny spot and enjoy the colors and never fading greens. Available in multiple base colors or mirrored if you're feeling fancy!

name: Southwestern Skull
description: Personal favorite. Baby deer skull I picked up in a field. Covered in amazing red, turquoise and brown glass. Hand applied, so design isn't perfect. I like that about it though.  11" long, 5" wide and 9" high Bone colored grout so it looks like glass is part of skull.

name: Agate Stone Cow Skull
description:
15" long, 8" wides and 5" high. 

Amazing cow skull, spray painted black and mosaiced in antique mirror and agate stones. Beautiful turquoise and blue stones pop against the reflection of the mirror. When light hits it it makes an amazing disco reflection (as mirror and light tend to do). Finished with black grout and sprayed with gloss after setting. One of a kind.

name: Table Top Prisms
description:
These amazing table toppers can be used for anything! Plant them, store your jewelry in them, fill them with stones. Anything you can think of (nothing edible, chemicals is chemicals and you can't make stained glass without em!)

Made from 12 equilateral beveled triangles and available in your choice of patina finish. Three sizes to choose from

3" 
4" 
6"- price is slightly higher to cover shipping

name: Crescent Necklace
description:
The moon is associated with clairvoyance and knowing without thinking. To use the energy of the moon does not involve conscious thought. So to wear or have around you the symbol of the moon is to state your universal intention to use your intuition, to simply go with what you feel and to know that to do this is for your greater good. 

The crescent moon symbolises new beginnings and the making of dreams into reality. Because of this cyclic nature the moon it is also connected to rebirth and how our true essence really is immortal.

Keeping these statements in mind I created a crescent charm to be worn as a necklace. The cream has a bold iridescence, the white has a light shimmer (my camera sadly could not pick this up, but you should be aware of that) and in black. You can choose another color if you have a preference, just choose custom then contact me with order number to let me know what color and patina you'd like! 

They measure at 2.5" and do not come with chain (as you choose patina, it's easier for you to pick up the chain or add to an existing necklace. Shipment is within 3 days.

options.name: Custom- please email me with details!

name: Limited Time Only! Dream Catcher Mirror
description:
Stunning 9" Dream Catcher Mirror. Made from recycled mirror and river stones that have been tumbled and polished.  Hung from a black suede cord. Creates partially broken reflection and when light bounces off it creates the dreamcatcher image all across the room. Strict limit of 12 being made, each piece has a hand stamped number on the back along with the Halona symbol. Get it while you can! 

Please allow a one week lead time before shipment. 
This item contains lead.

name: Custom Feather Necklace
description:
Why leave the glass in the window? 

4" long glass feather hung from a suede cord. You choose the color and I'll choose a glass in that shade. Varying textures. Dealers choice means I send you one of my choosing, clear will always be textured (unless you ask for regular clear) Rainbow means a "swirled" glass with a mix of colors. You may choose two colors and using the pattern, let me know which color you'd like where. Please email if you have any questions! 

Be sure to let me know what color cord (tan or black) and patina (black, copper or silver) you'd like as well. Thanks

name: Iridescent Feather Necklace
description:
Why leave the glass in the window? 

4" long glass feather hung from a suede cord. You choose the color and I'll choose a glass in that shade. Varying textures. Dealers choice means I send you one of my choosing, clear will always be textured (unless you ask for regular clear) Rainbow means a "swirled" glass with a mix of colors. 

After ordering please send me an email with invoice number stating which cord you would like (tan or black) and which patina finish. All three examples are showing: black, copper or silver. 

Please keep in mind the darker the glass the deeper the iridescent. Lighter colors seem more opalescent while deep shades have the oil slick look.

name: Feather Necklace
description:
Why leave the glass in the window? 

4" long glass feather hung from a suede cord. You choose the color and I'll choose a glass in that shade. Varying textures. Dealers choice means I send you one of my choosing, clear will always be textured (unless you ask for regular clear) Rainbow means a "swirled" glass with a mix of colors. 

After ordering please send me an email with invoice number stating which cord you would like (tan or black) and which patina finish. All three examples are showing: black, copper or silver.

name: Glass-Grass-or-Ass Patch PRE-ORDER
description:
4" Round, embroidered patch. Made in the USA. 5 color stitching on cream background. 

Once minimum is met 2 week processing time. Shipped USPS immediately upon arrival.

name: Dream Catcher
description:
14" around. Customized Dreamcatcher. 

Clear glass with bits of your choice of color for glass and nuggets. Each one will have an agate stone also included. Up to 2 colors allowed in each piece.  "rust" and turquoise" were the colors chosen for this specific dream catcher.

name: Indian Blanket #8
description:
72 individual pieces, 4 diamond bevels, alternating medium green and wispy dark green stripes with blue waterglass triangles, white center, seedy border and iridescent cream background. Twisted came border. 


 Can be hung vertical or horizontal.

20" x 16"

***This item contains lead***

name: Indian Blanket #13
description:
Original Design containing 63 individual pieces. Seedy Cathedral rust, spectrum turquoise, granite cream and wispy bright green. 7 bevels throughout. Twisted came border. 



13" x 12" 

***This item contains lead***

name: Palmistry Hand
description:
Clear Artique glass to mimic the natural lines found in hands. Each symbol and letter is hand painted on with black oil based marker to ensure no flaking. 

11" high

name: Horseshoe Panel
description:
Beveled horseshoe in panel. Turquoise, cathedral ruby red, swirled brown spectrum to mimic wood and seedy clear for center for added depth.

10" x 9" hung from a simple chain.

name: Grab Bag Quilt Hearts
description:
Perfect for Valentine's Day! 

5 inch wide hearts made from half circle bevels and 4 inch squares of art glass modeled after traditional quilt hearts. Scalloped foil with a black patina and center hoop for hanging. 

You choose the primary color and I will choose a varying color of that choice. Shades and textures will vary. Clear will always be textured. If you have a very specific color in mind please email me after ordering and I will do my very best to match it. 

Dealers Choice is just that, I will choose the heart for you.

name: Clear Feather
description: Beautiful Clear Feathers. Look great in a window or on a wall. 7.5 inches in length and 3 inches wide. Come in your choice of patina (silver, black or copper) and with a suction cup for easy hanging. All glass comes with a care card. This item contains lead.

name: Glass Eagle Feather
description:
9 inch long eagle feather with leather wrapped quill. 
Made with all Spectrum glass, solid black and wispy clear. Leather and beads will vary. If you have a specific color you'd like please let me know when purchasing. 

This item contains lead.

name: Native American Bevel Stained Glass Suncatcher
description:
This amazing suncatcher is made from 23 bevels and finished with a black patina. Pictures can't do it justice, magical and sparkling the prism edges of the bevels shoot rainbows when direct sun hits it and the most amazing shadows. It's my personal favorite bevel piece.

Height: 8 inches
Width: 9 inches
Single hoop for hanging on top of band. 

**This item contains lead**
** Please allow up to 2 weeks for shipment, if you need it expedited please contact me and I'll see what I can do.**

name: Bevel Chevron
description:
12 piece chevron of misc bevels. 11 inches by 5 inches and hung on a simple chain. Black patina offsets the polished clear bevels making each piece stand out perfectly. All items come with care instructions and suction cup for hanging.



**This item contains lead.**
**Please allow up to two weeks for delivery- if you need it expedited, contact me and we'll figure something out if possible**

Thank you!

name: Small Simple Arrow Tail
description:
Six 2x4 diamond bevels make up this arrow tail. 8 inches by 4 inches and hung on a simple chain. Black patina offsets the polished clear bevels making each piece stand out perfectly. Chain length of 4 inches with small hoop for hanging. The one pictured was for a long window, but if you need a specific length on chain just let me know when purchasing and I'll gladly make it that length.

All pieces come with suction cup and with an instruction manual on how to care for your stained glass piece.


**This item contains lead. **

name: Stretched Simple Arrow Tail
description:
Six 2X6 diamond bevels. Total dimensions of 9 inches by 4 inches. Hung on a 6 inch chain.

Comes with professional suction cup for hanging and instructions for care.

**This items contains lead**

name: Extra Large Bevel Diamond
description:
Amazing Geometric Beveled Diamond made from13 6x6x6 triangles and 4 2x2x2 triangles. 24 inches by 18 inches at longest and widest points.

This guy is heavy, so copper inserts to strengthen the piece and a lead edge to finish. Suction cups will only support it for so long, so I recommend a fishing line hung from wall.

Wood framing is available, please convo for me for costs and times.

**this item contains lead**

name: Geometric Double Bevel Arrow Tail
description:
Make any view gorgeous.

15 misc bevels make up this double arrow tail. 14 inches by 9 inches and hung on a simple chain. Black patina offsets the polished clear bevels making each piece stand out perfectly. Perfect companion piece for the Bevel Arrow Tail

All pieces come with suction cup and fishing wire along with instructions on how to care for your stained glass piece.

Custom Orders always welcomed.

This item contains lead.

name: Dodecahedron Planter
description: Beautiful glass dodecahedron planter with pentagram top panel. Each pentagon glass piece is 4.5" with a total height and width of 8". 11 sided, with one panel left open. Bottom solder lines are siliconed sealed to ensure the moisture of your planting won't cause a problem. Each planter comes with your choice of large or small river bed rocks. Pictured are the "large river bed rocks. Plants not included, this item contains lead.

name: Medium Geodesic Bevel Topper
description:
Turn any pot into a beautiful terrarium.

15  3" triangle bevels make this dome topper. Pentagon opening with 5 inch diameter. When the sun hits it beautiful rainbow and refracted light burst across the room. So stunning in person.

I use it as topper for planters, but really can be used for anything.


**this item contains lead**

name: Pyramid Beveled Hanging Planter
description:
6X6X6 Triangle Bevel Planter.

I use this guy as a planter but you could really use it for anything. If it's NOT going to be used for planting, let me know and I won't coat the inside seams with silicone.

This guy is hung from 3 delicate 10 inch chains and topped with a circle hoop for hanging. Wiring along the solder seams ensures a secure hanging life, even when fully planted. Placed in a window the beveled edges set off a burst of light and rainbow in the sun.

If purchased for use as a planter, I will enclose a baggie of lava rock as there is no drainage with this pot. All planters securely packaged.



This item contains lead

name: Beveled Diamond and Triangle Planter
description:

name: Quartz Cluster Stained Glass
description:
Amazing Cluster of Quartz Crystals Stained Glass piece. Completely customized!  Can be hung in a window or displayed on  a shelf (you will need to purchase a plate holder or lean it against a wall). Because these are not actual Crystals, I am using color psychology chart (gypsy magic) as a reference to help you pick your color. Information on Color Psychology here: http://psychology.about.com/od/sensationandperception/a/colorpsych.htm

Of course, you can always just pick your favorite colors. A few things to know: 1. The color is generalized, meaning if you say Green, it could be a light green or dark green. Please SPECIFY if you have preference. There will always be at least 2 iridescent glasses in the main quartz. Please look at picture 2, to see what iridescent means if you're not familiar. Picture 1 and 2 are the same piece (to show you how wonderful the iridescent can make pieces look!). I try to use textured glass, but it really varies from what I have in stock at the time. Most pieces will be made from entirely different textures to really offset each other. Also, often there are streaks of other colors in there, but the color you choose will be the main color you see. Please note the amber in Picture 1 has streaks of white, yellow, pink, etc but is still very much a amber crystal.  

WHEN ORDERING: Please put in the notes the color for each Crystal following the numbered chart. You are also welcome to just pick the 6 colors and I'll make sure it flows together nicely. 

EXAMPLES FOR ORDERING: 

A:  Lavenders please! 
B: 1. Black 2. Cream 3. Orange 4. Light Green 5. Dark Purple 6. Neon Orange 
C. 1. Pink.  the rest complimentary. 
D. Green, Yellow, Orange, Blue, Multi, White Your choice for which crystal! 


Feel free to write me with any questions! 

Height: 12.5 inches
Width: 11 inches
Single hook on top for hanging.

name: Quartz Crystal Stained Glass
description:
Single Quartz Crystal Stained Glass piece. You pick the color!  Can be hung in a window or displayed on  a shelf (you will need to purchase a plate holder or lean it against a wall). Because it is not an actual Crystal, I am using color psychology chart (gypsy magic) as a reference to help you pick your color. Information on Color Psychology here: http://psychology.about.com/od/sensationandperception/a/colorpsych.htm

Of course, you can just pick your favorite color. A few things to know: 1. The color is generalized, meaning if you say Green, it could be a light green or dark green. Please SPECIFY if you have preference. The center piece is always iridescent and a complimenting lighter shade. Please look at picture 3, to see what iridescent means if you're not familiar. If you'd like the entire piece to be iridescent, please specify that as well. I try to use textured glass, but it really varies from what I have in stock at the time. Often there are streaks of other colors in there, but the color you choose will be the main color you see. Please note the purple has streaks of blue, green, pink, etc but is still very much a purple crystal. Lastly, please choose between copper patina and black patina. The crystals listed show different colors and different patinas. 

Feel free to write me with any questions! 

Height: 11 inches
Width: 5 inches
Single hook on top for hanging.
